metadata.name: Hair (and Fez) With Physics [RGON]
metadata.description:
[h2]This mod requires REPENTOGON to work[/h2]
Check the link [url=https://repentogon.com][/url] [hr][/hr] This mod replaces the [i]static[/i] sprite of Bethany's tails (and Judas' fez) with a dynamic one, BLESSED BY THE POWER OF REPENTOGON
